title: Integration API
description: Connect an existing API to a third-party database using secure methods and handle data exchange efficiently.

title: Develop Frontend UI
description: Create user interface components using modern frontend frameworks such as React or Angular.

title: Database Optimization
description: Optimize database performance by fine-tuning queries, indexing, and database schema.

title: Implement Authentication
description: Implement user authentication and authorization using OAuth or JWT for secure access control.
